About the Game

Check yourself out as a pilot of toy airplane. Play air combat in house rooms and garden. Fight with the uboot in the bathtub and with the battleship in the sink. Bomb the tanks column and the enemy base using batteries. Shoot the soldiers hiding behind the flowerpot. Play aerial battles against enemy fighters avoiding their missiles.
Choose your machine and customize its equipment (machine gun, rocket guns, dropped bombs, special weapons).
Destroy your surroundings in search of upgrades and mission objectives.

Are you interested?

Check out more games:
